channel.title: VPS questions--50 + players
channel.description: I've been running a server for around 3 weeks, and have around 20-30 players on, 24/7, and expecting more members.. I need a VPS.. so, to run it stablely, what specs would you use to run a server with aroudn 50+ players on 24/7?? I was looking around for awhile and... I just don't know..lol

item.title: VPS questions--50 + players
item.dc:creator: @PvPTurf PvPTurf
item.description:
@PvPTurf wrote:

gamerbug:

I looked at the you messaged me pvp turf, but according to that one… your price you say is off. it costs $31 approximately. and yes, I can afford it, but the fantech one is a better deal.

Use the promotion code. It will be $21.75. Make sure you decline the business protection they offer, which is set to yes default.

Read full topic

item.title: VPS questions--50 + players
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“PvPTurf, post:12, topic:351333”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=447690.msg3285657#msg3285657 date=1280183621]
2-4 gb of ram
at least a 50+ gb HDD
and a 100-1k mb connections speed.
You can get what ever OS you like better, but a Linux OS would be the most efficient for a server.
[/quote]

Are you a nut? I have a 30 GB HDD, 1TB bandwidth Windows VPS, with 1GB RAM, and 4.0ghz speed.

Gamerbug - I PM’ed you the link.[/quote]

I am not a nut, how am I a nut?

Read full topic

Hostname: eg. server1(.yourdomain.com)
NS1 Prefix: eg. ns1(.yourdomain.com)
NS2 Prefix: eg. ns2(.yourdomain.com)

I looked at VPSIsland, and they look shitty,
